scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --success first --names "anvil,w3app" "npm run dev:contracts" "npm run dev-deploy-contracts && npm run dev:app"
scripts.dev-deploy-contracts: until curl -s http://localhost:8545 > /dev/null; do sleep 0.5; done && forge script script/DevDeploy.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:app
scripts.build:contracts: forge build && sh -c 'anvil & ANVIL_PID=$!; npm run dev-deploy-contracts; kill $ANVIL_PID'
